summary.p: The Zurich council has agreed with the Abbot of Rheinau [Bonaventura von Wellenberg] that a preacher should be elected for Marthalen, who will also be responsible for Rheinau and Benken. Therefore, the examiners are requested to propose a preacher so that the election can be conducted [on March 27].

div.p: The council has amicably agreed with the Abbot of Rheinau that a preacher should be elected for Marthalen, who will also be responsible for Rheinau and Benken, in accordance with the agreement made. To facilitate this, the examiners have been instructed to immediately make a proposal according to their order, from which the council can elect and nominate a preacher for the upcoming Saturday.
Done on Wednesday after Reminiscere in the year 1546, in the presence of Mayor Lavater and both councils.
